VI.ii.1.A.3.c
.
Acceptable Forms of Election on Behalf of the Claimant
Upon receipt of an election that a member of Congress or a claimant’s VA-recognized power of attorney (POA) provides on a claimant’s behalf, treat it as an
informal
election only after asking for and receiving from the claimant (or fiduciary) a signed statement that affirms the election.
Note
:  When an election is filed on behalf of the claimant, any evidence needed to support the election or any claim accompanying an election must be received within one year from the date of VA’s request for that evidence.  Otherwise, no further action may be taken on the election.
Reference
:  For more information on the submission of elections by a POA or member of Congress, see
38 CFR 3.155(a)
.
